overview: oin Peter and the Test Tube Babies, Sham 69, The Toy Dolls and The Exploited for this foot-stomping, head-thrashing exploration of the Oi! punk rock movement, which began in the late 1970s partly as a response to the glamorization of punk. Determined to stay fresh and political, Oi bands raged on, eschewing the mainstream route. This raucous collection gathers the best of the genre; extras include concert footage and interviews. Cast Sham 69, The Blood, Angelic Upstarts, Blitz, Splodgenessabounds, Peter and the Test Tube Babies, The Toy Dolls, Red Alert, One Way System, Exploited, the Oppressed, Condemned 84, Burial, Section 5, Boisterous, Another Mans Poison, Argy Bargy Genres Music & Musicals, Rock & Pop, Punk Rock
title: Oi! Oi! Oi!
